SELECT reviewer_id, content, review_date, bamboo_score, review_no FROM review WHERE talent_no = #{talentNo} ORDER BY review_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (talent_no, reviewer_id, content, review_date, bamboo_score ,review_no) VALUES (#{talentNo}, #{reviewerId}, #{content}, #{reviewDate}, #{bambooScore}, (SELECT MAX(review_no)+1 FROM review))
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET content = #{content}, bamboo_score = #{bambooScore} WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo}
